title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available while the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
1. Launch the application
2. Select both P1 and P2
3. Observe the availability of Open Project and Close Project menu items
